name: Bean Simulator (crawdad105)
description: In this game you start of with just your bear hands and you need to smack a can of beans to make money, don't ask how it works. You can use that money to upgrade weapons to do more damage to the monster that is the can of baked beans. you can sit back and relax to the sound of base boosted spedup among us drip and watch the hit comedian Mr. bean stare at you over his shoulders, and done wait to long, because he is eating chips, but only for a few minutes after the game starts. also don't mind the shop keeper, he hates everyone and will stare at you until you die.
